name: Aeris Stormrider
description: Aeris Stormrider, a half-elf sorcerer, was born into a prestigious elven family. However, her mixed heritage made her an outcast among her own kind, leading her to embrace her sorcerous powers and dark inclinations. Raised with a strict military background, Aeris excelled as a soldier, utilizing her magic to devastating effect on the battlefield. Yet, her hunger for power led her down a path of deceit and manipulation, ultimately causing her to abandon her comrades in search of greater magical knowledge. In her travels, she stumbled upon a mysterious diary written in an unknown language, sparking her obsession with unlocking its secrets and furthering her own sinister ambitions.

attributes.value: A diary written in a language you don’t know
